author: Terri Schwartz
title: Watch Jurassic Park with Star Joseph Mazzello (Tim Murphy) - WFH Theater
description: Join a special live watch-along Q&A of Jurassic Park with special guest and original cast member Joseph Mazzello, who played Tim Murphy, this Thursday at 5 p.m. PT!
content: Here at IGN, we're always looking for new ways to bring our community together to embrace what we're most passionate about. That's why we launched Watch From Home Theater, a weekly live show where we unite some of your favorite IGN personalities and special c… [+3850 chars]
